GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an object of article id

'article'.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
'article'.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an article array of article objects in descending date order, with added comment_count property

'articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
'articles.author: butter_bridge

GET/api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects for specified article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to specified article

PATCH /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an object of article id where votes have been increased

'article'.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
'article'.author: butter_bridge
